channel.title: SILoes on The Dry Dock
channel.description: Recent content in SILoes on The Dry Dock

item.title: SILO: The Why (Should)
item.description: I have decided that in addition to logging all of the situations in which I have employed SILO - successfully and not so successfully - that I should also create a place to note all the places that I should use SILO.
